DataElement.preferredName: BCL2 Greater Than Or Equal to Fifty Percent Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether BCL2 expression is greater than or equal to fifty percent.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: BCL2 Positive Greater Than Or Equality Fifty Percent Unit
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An indication that BCL2 expression has been detected in a sample.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The quality of being the same in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than forty-nine and less than fifty-one and the quantity that it denotes._A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An indication that BCL2 expression has been detected in a sample.

Concepts.definition: An indication that BCL2 expression has been detected in a sample.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
